attributes.action: Generating Revenue Income For UK Economy
attributes.additional_details:
Looking at the present economy crisis in the UK, I would like to suggest to you to reconsider granting Amnesty/work permit to the applicants who have lived in the UK for at least 10 years, both legal and illegal to work in other to generate more revenue income for the UK economy.

For the look of things, I believe the world and the UK economy is not going to get better soon.

As suggested last year in 2010 by Mr. Boris Johnson, Major of London, l believe this is the best thing to do in our present economy situation.
